short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all the tabs and restore them later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workspace Revive is your ultimate companion for effortless Chrome browsing. Save your windows and tabs with ease, creating a snapshot of your workspace. Whether you're taking a break or switching tasks, pick up exactly where you left off with just a click.
